title: all i wanted to do was play a game or two of league today
body:
load up the launcher, hit launch. nothing happens. no big deal, just repair game files and now that problem is fixed.

get into the client, sit through some of the most ridiculous matchmaking queue times that currently exists in online gaming, champion select ends, and i get a bugsplat instead of a loading screen. i kill the client in task manager and go to reopen it, and i get a message that says that i have to repair my game files AGAIN because it detected corrupted files. so i do so.

then, trying to get into a game for a second time, i manage to actually get into a loading screen for maybe all of 2 seconds, and then another bugsplat, another relaunch, another corruption error message, another file repair.

yea. fuck this dead game.

replies.body:
I appreciate your patience and the time you invested going through those steps and scans to fix this up.  Hit up our tech team through a [ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they can help figure out what's going wrong.  When you have some time, attach the below set of logs to the ticket which will provide some more context on your specific issue.  Hang in there, you'll be in good hands!

[DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)
